Photographer: [Photographer's Name] If the photographer's name is not known please indicate IPPA Staff as the Photographer
label: Foreign Minister David Levy made it quite clear that he would not be attending the Madrid peace conference following the decision of Prize Minister Shamir to head the Israeli delegation, instead of Levy.
